name: Work Focus Manager
description: Desktop app to manage application focus by grouping them under themes

steps.name: Project Setup
steps.description: Initialize project with Electron, React, and TypeScript
tasks: Install Electron, React, TypeScript, and other core dependencies
Create basic Electron main process file

steps.name: Basic UI Implementation
steps.description: Create the initial React UI for the application
tasks: Add basic styling with CSS or a UI framework

steps.name: Windows Process Management
steps.description: Implement functionality to detect and interact with running applications
tasks: Research Windows API for process and window management
Create Node.js native addon for Windows API access
Add window title and icon extraction capabilities
Create service to list all running applications

steps.name: Theme Management
steps.description: Implement functionality to create and manage application themes
tasks: Add functionality to assign applications to themes
Implement theme persistence with local storage

steps.name: Focus Management
tasks: Implement logic to filter applications by theme
Add functionality to minimize all non-theme applications

steps.name: Shortcut and System Integration
tasks: Implement global shortcuts for focus toggling

steps.name: Testing and Refinement
tasks: Implement unit tests for core functionality
Perform manual testing of all features
Refine UI/UX based on testing feedback
